timeline.message: Clean up SQL Server environment variables

timeline.bodyText: -1 on changing tihs. It will hurt our CI bandwidth and doesn't give you any new information
timeline.author: n1hility
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -58,8 +86,9 @@ jobs:
     needs: build-jdk8
     timeout-minutes: 120
     strategy:
+      fail-fast: false

replies.bodyText:
That's useful information. Because knowing it only fails on a particular JDK is useful.
Right now, the bandwidth is more hurt because we run all the native tests even if the JDK 8 fails.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
Or we should go back to our previous set up being we build on JDK 8 first and then we build the rest.
But not having a clue if it's an issue specific to one JDK will be a problem.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: @n1hility so I only disabled fail fast for forked repo. That way, we fail fast in the main repo and in their own repo, people have the full feedback.
replies.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Out of curiosity what's the story behind this one?
timeline.author: n1hility

replies.bodyText: We had some weird failures with SQL Server not being accessible while it was properly started, I'd like to see if it improves things or not.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: It's worth a try I guess, but I'm curious to why we thing that this will solve the issue :)
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: I know Sanne tried that at some point so that's why I thought of it.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: OK Cool. Lets hope it works
replies.author: geoand

timeline.bodyText: Hum. Apparently, we get a 404 for that one whereas it's supposed to be supported.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -60,7 +60,7 @@ jobs:
     strategy:
       fail-fast: false
       matrix:
-        java-version: [8, 11, 12]
+        java-version: [8, 11, 13]

replies.bodyText: Got back to 12 as I got a 404 with 13.
replies.author: gsmet

timeline.message: Don't fail fast on the JDK matrix build in forked repositories

Don't test the pushes on Dependabot branches

Testing the PRs is enough, we don't need things to be tested twice
Bind Docker services on localhost only
Define ignore rules for GitHub actions
Define ignore rules for GitHub actions
Find a better balance for the various misc jobs
